elements.name: Paying a bill with an amount greater than the balance

comments: # Obtener cuentas del cliente para conocer el saldo de una cuenta

steps.name: def extra = fakerObj.number().numberBetween(1, 500)
comments: # Construir un monto mayor que el saldo disponible

steps.name: path 'billpay'
comments: # Intentar pagar la factura haciendo POST a /services/bank/billpay
